Languages: Understands Common and can communicate telepathically within 30 ft.

Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuvering
Traits.Content: The Paper Plane has advantage on saving throws against effects that would cause it to be hit or targeted.

Traits.Name: Glide
Traits.Content: The Paper Plane can travel through the air without falling or being affected by wind conditions.

Actions.Name: Slice of Paper
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Wind Blast
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 15 (3d8 + 3) force damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from the Paper Plane.

Actions.Name: Paper Cut
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.
